title: bitcointradeagent
author: bitcointradeagent
content: 500,000 BTC Pieces is required by my clients.You might not have all, but you may send FCO for the one that you have.Make everything simple and easy to comprehendThis trade is strictly BANK to BANKNo Chain preferred and we are BUYER and SELLER's AGENT OURSELVESTreat as urgent.SEND YOUR GENUINE FCO TO1trillionbitcoin@gmail.comor even if you buy too

comments.author: BitcoinMoses
comments.body: You need your ICPO and BGL ready to expect any FCO from any seller. Also, you need produce your KYCÂ  compliance requirement to verify your identity. If you buy and sale Bitcoin illegally is liable to be procecuted. If you are a genuine high profile trader then you can contact me and I will guide you in 6 steps to purchase any volumes of BTC, Ether, BCH or any other cryptocurrency.

Seller's bank communicate with buyer's bank. It is just as simple as that. Yes there are other procedure but for this, the procedure remains this way.Thanks again

The problem is that you want to buy half a million Bitcoins, or at least it seems so from what you wrote - that's why I asked you to clarify if you mean maybe 500 000 satoshis or maybe 500 BTC? If you still insist on buying half a million Bitcoins, then calculate for me how much money is needed for that and why do you think that anyone on this forum could have so many Bitcoins?As far as I know, only one crypto exchange had a larger amount than that in their possession, and that's because they keep it for their clients.

comments.author: bitcointradeagent
comments.body: That is where you might have gotten it wrong. But first like my clarify, then i need 500,000 BTC and that was what i means not 500,000 satoshi. Of course, if i did not make another post, does not mean i have not gotten the first one posted years Months back. It does not need to wait.Â  You may think that no one here has it one the entire company does not have it. Am over 10 years in crypto as to source for what i needed has never become a problem. Remember i needed 500,0000?Â  Now i am selling. Tomorrow i will need. The quantity require for purchase and for sale depends on my source and post. In both cases, you will find me but let me tell you something more. The fact that i seek 500,000 BTC pieces does not mean it has to be in one tranche but you are been told that even if you have up to that, buyers are capable of procuring. Never make a mistake of thinking no one has. You can only know from whoever speaks up.As every order does not mean it is for an individual, every offer is not necessarily for an individual.It pains when people get worried for thing that don't concern them actually. See many calling others ripper as if they even had a business before.Quote from: Lucius on October 01, 2022, 12:12:46 PMQuote from: bitcointradeagent on September 30, 2022, 10:01:13 AMwhat exactly is the problem with the post?What i posted is what i do and that is it, if it is a treat to anyone due to hatred thereby hitting on negative score, that is their problem not mine. comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Why are the moderators still leaving this thread unlocked? It is clear the op is not a genuine trader, trying to buy 500,000 BTC. His attempt offering to buy half a million bitcoin like it is some biscuits on the counter makes the whole thing funny. He will have a hard time convincing anyone here to trade with him. So this thread remaining open or not deleted is not helpful in any way.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on September 30, 2022, 11:57:15 PMLast year you needed 10,000 BTC and faced a backlash. I am pretty sure you got no victim to scam here and then 1 year later boom!, you need to by 500,000 BTCÂ   You must be too dumb to think you will even scam 0.1 BTC from here using this style.Carry on!It actually surprising that, anyone would hope or think that somehow, they would find someone available to transact such a huge volume this way. Besides, what's stopping you @OP from buying with an exchange or perhaps, buy from sites like buy.bitcoin.com. Oh I get, your a middle man and as such, you wish or hope to act as an escrow to this transaction with hope of getting some percentage from the trade. Good enough, you've got zero reputation and hope anyone would be willing to deal with you with as low as 0.000001sat. You cant get that from this forum man, those who has the sort of volume your requesting definitely knows better than to deal this way.
